friendPlayers.hint: Our mountain goat community are concerned with these wormholes. Find their reason and source!
beware of these mysterious wormholes, they dont always go where you’d expect...
I got a little lost... Seems these wormholes travel to secret areas too.
you must find the route under this mountain, it's south of this mountain foot...
you are lost like us, try another wormhole hurry!
the forest is up ahead... Be wary of others, may stone, paper, and scissors guide you.
go back to the mountain, you shouldn't be here. if i see you again i'll kill you
